name: Tousler
description:
Protect the humans and deny the alien attackers in this original side-scroller shoot 'em up.  Have a blast while crushing the bad guys and saving the good guys. Save the day as you go for the high-score while enjoying the pixel art sprites in this single-player, sci-fi, bullet hell, shooter.


Fly your very own , state of the art, Tousler spacecraft!

Use mad skills to avoid becoming a casualty of war!

Protect the humans from the wretched alien menace!

Take the battle to space, where nobody can hear them scream!
